:::Starscream:::

::He had gotten over the shock of seeing Megaton and realized that if 
he is joining them, They might as well be on friendlier terms::
Starscream: It seems we will be allies from now on.  What do you say 
we let bygones be bygones?



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton saw Starscreem coming towards him. The bot didn't seem to 
happy about the mutants arival. He seemed a little disgruntaled like 
a postman with an automatic weapon. 
> 
> Megaton stopped for a moment to ascess the situation. "Yes 
Starscreem it is I." the memory of the missle going off in his mouth 
still left a bad taste in his mouth. He'd hoped for a warm arrival, 
in a volcano what other kind was there?
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Alloran2@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Thursday, February 15, 2001 4:37 AM
>   Subject: Wheeljack/Starscream sees Megaton/Atma and Psuedo attack
> 
> 
>   OOC: D'oh! I keep forgetting what Wheeljack did! Okay, scratch 
that post. 
> 
>   :::Wheeljack/Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian/Atma/Psuedo::: 
> 
>   Wheeljack: Why, yes it does.  I put those sheilds up myself.  
Hmm, turrets 
>   under water sounds like an excellent idea. 
>   ~~~~~ 
>   ::My Predacons wake up and go outside.  There they see Drillbit 
talking to 
>   Megaton. Starscream cannot beleive his eyes:: 
>   Starscream: YOU? 
>   ::He remembered their dogfight back in the arctic:: 
>   ~~~~~ 
>   ::Atma and Psuedo immeadiately see that Burning Hammer is the 
enemy:: 
>   Atma: Thats right, were here to help you. 
>   ::Atma takes out his gun and fires 25 shots at Burning Hammer.  
Psuedo fires 
>   2 missles from each of his two guns at Burning Hammer::
